data.title: 键入缺少的字母，完成下面的文字
data.blankContent:
Grace: What are you planning to wear to the wedding?
Sarah: It's a fancy ____, ____ I ____ picked ____ a ____ black ____. What ____ you?
Grace: I'm ____ sure ____. Kate ____ that ____ is ____ blue, so I want ____ choose ____ different. Maybe I'll wear that fancy red dress?
data.partBlankContent:
Grace: What are you planning to wear to the wedding?
Sarah: It's a fancy o__, s_ I ha__ picked o__ a lo__ black go__. What ab___ you?
Grace: I'm n__ sure y__. Kate sa__ that s__ is wea____ blue, so I want t_ choose some_____ different. Maybe I'll wear that fancy red dress?
data.fullContent: Grace: What are you planning to wear to the wedding? Sarah: It's a fancy one, so I have picked out a long black gown. What about you? Grace: I'm not sure yet. Kate said that she is wearing blue, so I want to choose something different. Maybe I'll wear that fancy red dress?
data.answer: 格蕾丝:你打算穿什么去参加婚礼? 萨拉:很漂亮，所以我选了一件黑色长裙。你呢? 格蕾丝:我还不确定。凯特说她穿的是蓝色的，所以我想选择一些不同的。也许我会穿那件红色的礼服?
